name: places/ChIJHT9zHAxZwokRbf6GwnAygak
formattedAddress: 875 Park Ave #1e, New York, NY 10075, USA
adrFormatAddress: 875 Park Ave #1e, New York, NY 10075, USA

originalText.text: An absolutely great dental experience. The staff is careful, thorough, and kind. They take care to make the experience very pleasant and ease anxieties around the dentist. I had a pleasant time watching Netflix with provided noise cancelling headphones while my teeth were cleaned. Unlike many other dentists, they provided an itemized receipt of what every procedure costs so I never felt caught off guard. I also appreciated Dr. Wong breaking down dental products and what I should be looking for when I shop for toothpastes and mouthwashes. I have 0 complaints and can't recommend Dr. Wong's practice enough.

originalText.text: Dr. Wong and her team were so accommodating and pleasant to visit. They were very flexible when I needed to move my appointment many times for work. They also really took their time to explain my care options and clearly lay out costs. I plan to make Joule Dental my go-to dentist moving forward!

text.text: Dr. Wong and her team were so accommodating and pleasant to visit. They were very flexible when I needed to move my appointment many times for work. They also really took their time to explain my care options and clearly lay out costs. I plan to make Joule Dental my go-to dentist moving forward!

originalText.text:
I could not imagine a better dentist. Dr. Wong runs an incredibly professional practice. The whole team - Dr. Surdi, Nia, Badrunessa, and the rest of the fabulous crew - are polite and knowledgeable. I am deeply confident in their care, and I feel significantly more confident about my oral health as a patient of this practice.

Dr. Wong was especially remarkable during an emergency situation. She saw me the same day, taught me how to relieve the pain, and ensured I got proper care.

I would give 6 stars if I could!

text.text:

originalText.text: Dr Wong is the nicest, most caring dentist I’ve ever had the pleasure - and desperate need - to meet. But, most importantly, highly professional and puts a high priority on comfort for the patient. I was visiting NYC and had an emergency situation. She helped me in spite of having planned to spend the time with her 3 month old baby and saved my tooth from needing a root canal. Her office has the latest high tech machinery and is bright and welcoming. I can’t say enough good things about Dr Wong

originalText.text:
Dr. Wong and her team provides exceptional service. From the time you walk in the door until you leave, they are all so friendly and attentive. They went above and beyond to make me feel right at home.

Dr. Wong is  very nice, personable and knowledgeable. She takes her time and explains everything to you from start to finish. I couldn’t more satisfied and happy that I found a dental practice that’s affordable, where I feel comfortable and know that I am going to receive the highest level of care possible. I highly recommend Joule Dental and I’m looking forward to my next visit.
